text.description:
{Cloud-treading Boots}

Their movement on land is increased by 900 points.No extra movement points are required when passing through difficult terrains, and creatures are granted the ability of charge attack.
text.event: A man with a scarred face blocked your way. After a fierce battle, with a clap of thunder, he was finally killed by you. Only a pair of shoes were left in this place.
text.name: Cloud-treading Boots
